description: Structured information on an image annotation.
label: Annotation
name: Annotation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV._instruction: Add the coordinate point identifying the best view of this annotation in space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV.description: Coordinate point from which you get the best view of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV.label: Best view point
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV.name: bestViewPoint

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.label: Criteria
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.name: criteria

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.label: Criteria quality type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.name: criteriaQualityType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ._instruction: Enter the preferred display color (HEX) for this annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ.label: Display color
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ.name: displayColor

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inspi._instruction: Add one or several (source) images that inspired the definition of this annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inspi.label: Inspired by
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inspi.name: inspiredBy

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this annotation within the file it is stored in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body or bilateral organ that this annotation is defined in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later.description: Differentiation between a pair of lateral homologous parts of the body.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later.label: Laterality
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later.name: laterality

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/namin._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities that name this annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/namin.description: Word or expression that has a precise meaning within a science, art, profession, or subject.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/namin.label: Naming term
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/namin.name: namingTerm

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities of registered parcellation terminologies to which this annotation is related to.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Related parcellation term
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relatedParcellationTerm

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua._instruction: Add the image in which this annotation is visualized in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua.description: Reference to an image in which something is visible.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua.label: Visualized in
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua.name: visualizedIn
